thread.title: Gumtree widower goes on fishing trip around Sydney Harbour | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Gumtree widower goes on fishing trip around Sydney Harbour | Daily Mail Online

author: Cindy Tran For Daily Mail Australia
title: Gumtree widower goes on fishing trip around Sydney Harbour | Daily Mail Online
text: From lonely Ray to Australia's most popular fishing date: Lonely Gumtree widower hits Sydney Harbour for another fishing trip - after the pensioner's regular buddy died Adelaide man Ray Johnstone 75, posted on Gumtree looking for a fishing buddy The pensioner's friend had recently died and he did not want to fish alone He placed an advert on the classifieds website seeking for a new fishing buddy The elderly man went on an idyllic trip around Sydney Harbour on Sunday Kind strangers raised money to fly Mr Johnstone to Sydney for a fishing trip Published: 22:39 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 23:23 GMT, 19 February 2017 71 shares
